question: Consider the following about Convention on Biodiversity 1.It came up at the 1992 Earth Summit in Rio de Janeiro. 2.India submitted its seventh National Report to the Convention on Biological Diversity. Which one is true?
explanation: One of the key agreements adopted at Rio 1992 was the Convention on Biological Diversity. India recently submitted its Sixth National Report to the Convention on Biological Diversity. India is among the first five countries in the world, the first in Asia and the first among the biodiversity-rich mega diverse countries to have submitted the report.
